title: My friend stolen account
body: My friends account got stolen named --  and i rly want to help him so i hope Riot you can help him to get hes account back in EUNE

replies.body: I've removed the name for security reasons.  Ask your friend to reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account recovery team can help.  I appreciate your wanting to help him out, but we'll have to work solely with the account owner to assist with recovery.  Hang tight!
